attributes.action: The People Demand a Vote on the Brexit Deal to Accept or Reject it!.
attributes.additional_details: Cameron introduced a vote to the Public of grave consequences and had no plans laid out. He then resigned after stating he would stay. Farrage Claimed success for Fear campaign then resigned. "Leave"  also complete fabrication of facts. Leaving "Out" voters conned and deceived out of their votes, their future's. With no grounds on which to fight their positions on facts. Endangering their fellow citizen's liberty's & democracy that voted "In" by cheating both sides out of Democratic Justice.
attributes.background: The Campaign for Brexit was based solely on Lies! A Blindfolded Vote. People need facts & Honesty to make an informed decision on their futures. On the Brexit Deal.  Forcing another to accept the referendum lies they we were sold. Undemocratic.Threatens Truth of Democracy, Stability of our Country
